about_the_game:
Tale of Two Sardines is a free RPGMaker game about doing chores, living life in Japan, political commentary, interacting with a ton of sardines... and fixing the universe.

Features:

  • Unique hand-drawn art style.
  • Save at any time.
  • Lots of cutscenes & character portraits.
  • Multiple endings.
  • An (almost) non-silent protagonist in an RPGMaker horror game.
  • Exactly one chase sequence.
  • Probably a plot twist.

Important Note:

This game makes a lot of statements, shows specific views on certain difficult issues, and takes a strong political stance that some people may not agree with. The political views shown by this game do not necessarily represent the opinions of this game's developers. This game is a work of fiction. Any connections to real names, people, and incidents are purely coincidental.

Note from the developer:

Thank you for reading this far! I am a solo developer based in the New England region, and it really means a lot to me that you're checking this game out! Tale of Two Sardines is my second game, and I'm really working on changing things up with the typical RPGMaker formula! There is much less dialogue, but more "cinematic" moments than Annie and the Art Gallery. Stay tuned!
-jswessler

content_descriptors.notes: This game contains descriptions and drawings of potentially disturbing historical events, which some people may find offensive. This game portrays strong political views and political violence. Additionally, this game contains themes of parental loss and depression/anxiety.

detailed_description:
Discord

name: Tale of Two Sardines

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Definitely Not Windows 10
  • Processor: KitchenAid KMCC5015GSS Microwave
  • Graphics: N64 Reality Coprocessor
  • Sound Card: airpods (pro/max/plus/ultra/extreme/lightning)
  • Additional Notes: Battlepass not included. Comes with a free 2008 Toyota Prius.
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 10/11
  • Processor: Intel Core i3-4340 / AMD FX-4330 or better
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: OpenGL compatible card, 1GB VRAM
  • DirectX: Version 9.0c
  • Storage: 1 GB available space
  • Additional Notes: 1280x720 display recommended for the best visuals.

short_description: Guide Miko through her daily life in alternate-universe Japan! Help her do her homework, clean up the dishes and re-arrange time and space. Make sure you do this quickly, because the world may or may not be coming to an end!
